name: Geoffrey Atkins
routine: Geoffrey goes to bed at 9pm and is up by 5:00 am to take his dog for a walk.
occupation: Now retired, Geoffrey was a history professor and spends his time writing articles and giving guest lectures.
thoughts: He is preparing a lecture on modern history to be delivered on the 3rd of February, 2024, which brings back memories of his teaching days.
lifestyle: Geoffrey enjoys a slow-paced lifestyle, often reads historical biographies, and has a preference for classical music and quiet evenings with a glass of fine whiskey.

name: Aleksey Chernov
routine: Aleksey Chernov sleeps at 12am and wakes at 7am to walk his dog.
occupation: Aleksey is a computer security analyst who works a standard 9 am to 5 pm day.
thoughts: He is anxious about a server breach his company faced and has been working extra hours since February 1st, 2024, to resolve the situation.
lifestyle: He prefers hearty Russian meals, relaxes by ice fishing on weekends, and has a functional and straightforward home setup.
